allow: Bash(for file in Pages/TebakApa-Antartika.html Pages/TebakApa-Got.html Pages/TebakApa-Gurun.html Pages/TebakApa-Hutan.html)
Bash(do sed -i 's/font-family: Arial, sans-serif;/font-family: ""Luckiest Guy"", Arial, sans-serif;/g' "$file")

Bash(do sed -i '/<link rel=""preconnect"" href=""https:\/\/fonts.googleapis.com"">/d; /<link rel=""preconnect"" href=""https:\/\/fonts.gstatic.com"" crossorigin>/d; /<link href=""https:\/\/fonts.googleapis.com\/css2?family=Luckiest+Guy/d' "$file")
